articles.title: DRDO conducts key test of scramjet engine
articles.description: India's DRDO successfully tested a scramjet engine, advancing its hypersonic missile program and positioning the nation at the forefront of aerospace technology.| India News
articles.content: The Defence Research & Development Laboratory (DRDL), a Hyderabad based DRDO laboratory, has achieved “a path-breaking milestone” in the development of hypersonic missiles, the defence ministry said. “DRDL successfully conducted an extensive long-dur... [2556 chars]

articles.title: Can data centres produce drinking water?
articles.description: In the last few years, they successfully built technology that converts air to drinking water, producing 5,000 litres of water a day| India News
articles.content: Data centres of the future might just become a source of clean drinking water for your homes. That’s the future that Uravu Labs, a Bangalore-based climate technology startup is working towards. In the last few years, they successfully built technolog... [7555 chars]

articles.title: Dr Jitendra lays foundation of ‘SAMARTH’ National Centre, inaugurates DNA Incubator at Hyderabad
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent Hyderabad, Jan 9: Emphasising that early detection and affordability are the two biggest challenges in addressing genetic and rare diseases, Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Space and Department of Atomic Energy, Dr. Jitendra Singh, today said that India is now scientifically and economically equipped to take on complex health challenges through genomics, biotechnology, and preventive healthcare. The Minister was speaking during his visit […]

Hyderabad, Jan 9: Emphasising that early detection and affordability are the two biggest challenges in addressing genetic and rare diseases, Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences... [3363 chars]

articles.title: Lollipop uses tech to create 'concert in your mouth.' See how it works.
articles.description: Lollipop Star, a candy that uses technology to create a "concert in your mouth," is officially available for purchase. Here's how it works.
articles.content:
A one-of-a-kind lollipop has the potential to make concertgoing a singular experience, or at the very least a way to get the best of both worlds.
Described as a way "to turn candy into a concert in your mouth," Lollipop Star utilizes bone conduction ... [2143 chars]

articles.title: DRDO conducts long-duration ground test of scramjet engine for hypersonic missiles
articles.description: NEW DELHI, Jan 9 : Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has achieved a key milestone in the development of hypersonic missiles, as it successfully conducted a long-duration ground test of its actively cooled scramjet combustor, the defence ministry said on Friday. Defence Research & Development Laboratory (DRDL), the Hyderabad-based laboratory of the DRDO, has achieved a “path-breaking milestone” in the development of such missiles, the ministry said, as it shared the update on scramjet-powered hypersonic technology. “The DRDL successfully […]
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Jan 9 : Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has achieved a key milestone in the development of hypersonic missiles, as it successfully conducted a long-duration ground test of its actively cooled scramjet combustor, the de... [2057 chars]

articles.title: In missile tech milestone, Scramjet combustor achieves run time of over 12 minutes
articles.description: The DRDO successfully conducted a 12-minute long ground test of its Actively Cooled Scramjet Full Scale Combustor at the SCPT facility, marking a significant achievement in hypersonic missile technology. The test was conducted by DRDL, a premier facility responsible for missile development.

articles.title: gen RGB MiniLED technology TVs, smart home tech at CES 2026
articles.description: Tv News: Hisense has unveiled its latest innovations at CES 2026. Under the theme “Innovating a Brighter Life”, the company showcased RGB MiniLED technology TV.
articles.content: Hisense has unveiled its latest innovations at CES 2026. Under the theme “Innovating a Brighter Life”, the company showcased RGB MiniLED technology TVs, laser projectors and smart home technologies at the biggest consumer tech event of the year. The ... [1468 chars]

articles.title: Jasrotia takes up road, railway projects with Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Jan 9: MLA from Jasrota constituency, Rajiv Jasrotia, today met Union Minister of State in PMO with Independent charge of Science & Technology and Earth Sciences Ministries Dr Jitendra Singh here and demanded development of critical road infrastructure and railway connectivity projects in Jasrota constituency of district Kathua of J&K. During the meeting, Jasrotia submitted a written representation highlighting the urgent infrastructural needs of the constituency, with a special focus on road connectivity, railway underpasses, and […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Jan 9: MLA from Jasrota constituency, Rajiv Jasrotia, today met Union Minister of State in PMO with Independent charge of Science & Technology and Earth Sciences Ministries Dr Jitendra Singh here and demanded develo... [2509 chars]

articles.title: Supreme Court will take up Cisco's bid to shut down lawsuit by Falun Gong
articles.description: The Supreme Court has agreed to take up an appeal from tech giant Cisco seeking to shut down a lawsuit claiming that the company’s technology was used to persecute members of the Falun Gong spiritual movement in China
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) — The Supreme Court agreed Friday to take up an appeal from tech giant Cisco seeking to shut down a lawsuit claiming that the company’s technology was used to persecute members of the Falun Gong spiritual movement in China.
The justic... [1264 chars]
